page.title: 17 PRESENT AND FUTURE CONTD.
page.content: Comments from a lifelong resident. {Roads.}The road between Kirk Ireton and Hopton should have passing places. This is our main bus route. Buses, milk tankers, corn lorries etc. take up most of the road. Blackwall Lane blind bends should be removed to improve visibility. Broom Lane lower end needs improving. {School.}This is now in a good state of repair and we must ensure that there are enough children to keep it open. It is the centre of village life and occupies an ideal site in the centre of the village. The{village shop, Post {Office}and the limited{bus service}we have, must all be retained. {Village Hall.}This is used a lot more these days and various improvements have been made. It is hoped that soon play equipment will be placed on the open space in Peats Close.
